decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Underworld Breach to create infinite loops with Mishra's Bauble and Grinding Station, enabling quick wins through a powerful combo. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Malevolent Rumble provide additional card draw and disruption to control the game state. Urza's Saga acts as a tutor for key pieces of the combo, while Mox Amber and Mox Opal accelerate mana production. The deck also includes various utility lands and spells to support the primary combo strategy and ensure consistency in executing the win condition.

The main focus of this deck is to use ramp and control elements to quickly get Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield, particularly Emrakul, the Promised End. The deck utilizes cards like Eldrazi Temple, Ugin's Labyrinth, and Karn, the Great Creator to accelerate mana production and disrupt opponents. The inclusion of Kozilek's Command, Malevolent Rumble, and Kozilek's Return provide removal and board control, while cards like Nulldrifter and Sowing Mycospawn help generate card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful Eldrazi creatures and establish a dominant board presence.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures and burn spells to put pressure on the opponent. Utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, the goal is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total while maintaining board control with Static Prison and Goblin Bombardment. Showdown of the Skalds provides card advantage and Galvanic Discharge serves as a versatile removal spell. The deck also includes some card draw with Seasoned Pyromancer and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to keep the pressure on and overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on using Eldrazi creatures to control the game while ramping into powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It utilizes a combination of land acceleration, mana rocks, and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan and establish a dominant board presence. Karn, the Great Creator acts as a versatile toolbox, while cards like Ugin's Labyrinth and Kozilek's Return provide additional control elements. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi threats while maintaining control of the game through disruption and resource management.

The deck focuses on using discard effects to quickly fill up the graveyard with creatures like Hollow One and Flamewake Phoenix, allowing for explosive starts and aggressive plays. With cards like Burning Inquiry and Goblin Lore, the deck can quickly churn through its library to find key creatures and spells. Marauding Mako and Arena of Glory provide additional ways to get value from the graveyard and keep the pressure on opponents. The deck thrives on speed and tempo, overwhelming opponents before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive creatures and disrupting your opponent's game plan with tax effects and removal spells. By combining creatures like White Orchid Phantom and Emperor of Bones with cards like Ephemerate and Aether Vial, you can generate value and pressure your opponent. Recruiter of the Guard helps you find key pieces while cards like Flickerwisp and Skyclave Apparition provide additional disruption. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with efficient creatures and control the board to secure a victory.

This deck aims to quickly assemble the combo pieces necessary to utilize Underworld Breach and Grinding Station for a powerful win condition. It uses cards like Emry, Mishra's Bauble, and Mox Opal to generate card advantage and mana acceleration, while also disrupting the opponent with disruption like Soul-Guide Lantern and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. Once the combo is assembled, it can generate a loop of milling and sacrificing artifacts to win the game through alternative win conditions like Grapeshot or Malevolent Rumble.
